item.description:
Memorial Day has come and gone!

And The X & O's Ultra Lounge is still here!

Let's welcome our original hometown stepper who will be here visiting Boston " Ms Crystal Ramsey".

Come on down after work this Monday to get your step on, get your practice on, from 7:30pm-10pm

We've made arrangements to control the music and to have the dance floor cleared and ready for us Steppers.

If the steppers come out and support this venue, this is a steppin opportunity that could happen once a month, or twice a month depending on the demand, and interest from the steppers.

Listen to the great sounds of R & B, smooth jazz, the funky classics by DJ T Clark! And of course your steppin favorites!!

The best martinis, great food, shoot pool, or just chill.

The X & O's Ultra Lounge
217 Washington St
Stoughton, MA 02072
781-344-1800

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin' @ X & O Ultra Lounge
